Translations.Text: And if you see when the Mujrimun are such that hang their heads before their Nourisher-Sustainer (and say): Our Nourisher-Sustainer! We have seen and heard (every thing), so send us back, we shall do righteous deeds (in the world, henceforth). Surely, we are (now) those who have attained certainty (in Faith).”
And if We had wished, surely, We would have given every nafs her guidance. But the statement proceeding from Me took effect (about evil-doers). Surely I will fill Hell with jinn and mankind together
Then taste you because of your forgetting the meeting of this Day of yours; indeed, We also forgot you (like-wise). And now taste the lasting punishment for what you used to do

Certainly, what (is a fact is that) those Believe in Our Ayaat who, when they were reminded or admonished therewith, behaved as those who are in obedience, and they glorified (Him) with the Praise of their Nourisher-Sustainer, and they do not commit arrogance in pride

Their sides forsake the beds; they invoke their Nourisher-Sustainer in fear and hope; and of the provisions We bestowed unto them — they spend (in accordance with the counselling and advice available in Al-Kitab)
And no nafs knows what joy of the eyes is kept hidden for them as a reward for what they used to do
Is then he who became a Believer like one who turned a Fasiq (disobedient and a deceiver)? They are not equal
As for those who have Believed and did righteous deeds, so for them are Gardens of abode as a welcome for what they used to do

And as for those who committed Fisq, their abode will be the Fire. Every time they wished that they may get away therefrom, they were pushed back therein and it was proclaimed to them: ' Taste you the torment of the Fire which — you used to deny of that
